title: ARAM Random?
body: I'm constantly getting the same 5 characters over and over in ARAM. You guys might want to try a different algorithm considering the opposing team seems to always gets a lux and a strong ADC.

replies.body:
Every patch something changes in ARAM's picking process that tags certain champions for you as the ones you'll end up getting at a higher % chance.
Even if this isn't true it's how it feels.
Every patch I end up with different champions but have a consistency during a patch.
I have an above average champ pool and I get the same champ back to back frequently. As well as the same 5 champs frequently. It's annoying
The RNG does seem biased. I also seem to play a small pool of champion more often than others. I need to start taking stats on this just to see.

ARAM smurfs. I was asking and begging Rioter latency (the guy responsible for ARAM) to fix ARAm and make it truly random. But he's master-tier at ignoring boards.

Sigh.
There are people who create accounts purely so that they get the highest chance to get a really strong ARAM champion.
Something I didn't consider! Good observation!
